emissions_calculation_data.energy_consumption_warning: The time window is lower than one hour, but the energy consumption estimate is in Watt.Hour. So this is an extrapolation of the power usage profile on one hour. Be careful with this data.

location_warning.warning_message: Location is either set as default, or has not been set, and is therefore set to the default BoaviztAPI location. Be aware that the presented results can be drastically different due to location. It is recommended that you set the asset location with the corresponding country code, see: https://doc.api.boavizta.org/Explanations/usage/countries/

total_operational_emissions.description: GHG emissions related to usage, from start_time to end_time.

total_operational_abiotic_resources_depl.description: Abiotic Resources Depletion (minerals & metals, ADPe) due to the usage phase.

total_operational_primary_energy_consume.description: Primary Energy consumed due to the usage phase.

start_time.description: Start time for the evaluation, in timestamp format (seconds since 1970)

end_time.description: End time for the evaluation, in timestamp format (seconds since 1970)

average_power_measured.description: Average power measured from start_time to end_time
